caption.p: A total of seven hub genes and module genes were evaluated for predicting the progression-free survival of patients with non-functioning pituitary adenoma, including (A) NOL6, (B) MOV10, (C) CDK15, (D) DCP1A, (E) SAMM50, (F) COL24A1 and (G) EPHX1. Log-rank or Renyi test P<0.05 was considered statistically significant. (H) Relative expression of NOL6 and LL21NC02-21A1.1 by reverse transcription-quantitative PCR analysis, which results basically matched those of the microarray analyses. *P<0.05.
